mewani dawantha mudalak ekawara yodawamin maha parimana marga sanwardhana wyapruthiyak me pradeshaye kriyathmaka karenne ithihasaye prathama warata bawath sandahan weyi.kadinamin marga paddhathiya nisi aakarawa prathisanskaranaya kota janatha ayithiyata pawarima thama mulika aramuna bawa prakasha kala prasanna gunasinha solangaaarachchi mahatha thawaduratath kiya sitiye marga sanwardhana katayuthu sandaha janathawa aathmarthakamithwayen thorawa pradeshiya sabhawatath marga sewakayantath sahayogaya diya yuthu bawayi.thawada mema wyapruthiyata sahaya labadun pradeshiya sabhawe niladhariwaruntath, aasiyanu sanwardhana bankuwe niladhari mahathuntath, meyata nan ayurin sahaya labadun samatath sabhapathithuman mehidi wisheshayen thama hrudayangama sthuthiya pala kale ya.mema awasthawata janadhipathi deshapalana katayuthu ha wruththiya samithi katayuthu pilibanda adhyaksha janaral bharatha lakshman premachandra, hitapu parlimenthu manthri nawalage benat kure yana mahathwaru ekwuha.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
